quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.text: Your limitationâ€”it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I have learned throughout my life as a composer chiefly through my mistakes and pursuits of false assumptions.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: May you live all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: In order to write about life first you must live it.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon
